settings.heading: specifications
settings.content:
-Developed by women doctors and gynecologists

-Gynecologically and dermatologically tested

-Free from allergens, alcohol and parabens

-Made in Sweden

-100% vegan

-3.4 FL. OZ

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content: For external use only. Pour into hand and apply. Rinse thoroughly.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Fresh Coconut and Violet Cotton: Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Chloride, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lactic Acid, Polyquaternium-10, PEG-14M, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Citric Acid

Jasmine Pear: Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Chloride, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Levulinate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Anisate, Polyquaternium-10, Cocamide MEA, PEG-14M, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acic, Fragrance (Parfum)

Fragrance Free: ﻿Aqua (Water), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Propylene Glycol, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Chloride, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycerin, Lactic Acid, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Polyquaternium-10, PEG-14M, Cocamide MEA, Diazolidinyl Urea, Lodopropynyl Butlcarbamate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid

settings.heading: Scents
settings.content:
Jasmine Pear: Calming scent with hints of pear & subtle floral notes

Fresh Coconut: A sweet yet tropical blend of creamy coconut

Violet Cotton: Fresh & clean aroma with warm cotton notes

Fragrance Free: Fragrance Free

settings.text:
"While the vagina is self-cleaning, the same does not apply for the vulva (the outer part of your intimate area), which is not self-cleansing. The vulva produces sweat, that together with urine easily can get trapped in the hair follicles. 

The intimate skin can not be treated like the rest of the skin on your body as it has such a delicate ecosystem that can easily be thrown out of balance. Any products used on the vulva should have a pH of 5 (as the vulva has pH 5). You should never wash with regular soap, body wash or gel, as these contain a higher pH level and non-hypoallergenic fragrance ingredients that are not correctly formulated for intimate skin. Products with a different pH level than the vulva can disrupt your vulva’s natural pH, leading to irritation, discomfort and possibly infections."

-Dr. Hedieh Asadi, Medical Doctor

settings.title: Step 3
settings.text: Apply on your vulvar area and rinse thoroughly.

settings.title: WHY DO YOUR PRODUCTS CONTAIN PERFUME?
settings.text:
DeoDoc only uses hypoallergenic scents/perfumes in all of our products. Hypoallergenic scents are free from alcohol, allergens and irritants, therefore, they are safe for intimate skin.

Regular perfume should never be used in the intimate area as it contains:

- alcohol which can have a dehydrating effect

- allergens that can cause irritation

settings.title: Why should my intimate wash have a pH of 5?
settings.text: Any products used on the vulva should have a pH of 5 (as the vulva has a pH of 5). You should never wash with regular soap, body wash or gel, as these contain a higher pH level and non-hypoallergenic fragrance ingredients that are not correctly formulated for intimate skin. Products with a different pH level than the vulva can disrupt your vulva’s natural pH, leading to irritation, discomfort and possibly infections.

settings.title: Can I use this to clean my vagina?
settings.text: The vagina is self-cleaning and should not be washed.

settings.title: ARE DEODOC'S PRODUCTS SAFE TO USE?
settings.text:
DeoDoc follows European Union regulations for the manufacturing of cosmetic products

- DeoDoc ingredients and products fulfills the safety standards for area of use (i.e. Vulva-safe & vagina-safe dependent on product) according to EU regulations for cosmetic products

- Each product is gynaecologically tested which means they are tested on women outside of a lab environment

- Products are dermatologically tested for sensitive skin

- All of our products are developed together with DeoDoc's co-founder and Professor of Obstetrics and Gynecology, Dr. Gunvor Ekman Ordeberg

settings.title: Is it suitable for sensitive skin?
settings.text: Yes, our Daily Wash is carefully formulated to gently cleanse without disrupting the vulvar microbiome.
